CustomField.formula: AND( Blended_Discount__c > Approved_Discount__c, Associated_Opportunity_Type__c = 'Revenue Opportunity', SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.RecordType.Id = '0121a000000VnAB', SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Account.RecordType.Id != '0121a000000VnIa', CONTAINS(Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'IND ENT AE NA') )
CustomField.label: Entry Criteria Met for Ind Ent
